title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Prevent Doomsday for Double Rewards
content:
Thwart tech mogul Avon Hertz's plans for world domination in The Doomsday Scenario — the finale of The Doomsday Heist — for 2X GTA$ and RP during the second week of The Heist Challenge.

The underground Facility property required to kick off The Doomsday Heist is currently 40% off at Maze Bank Foreclosures. Anyone looking to spruce up their Facility with Style and Graphics decorations or powerful upgrades such as the Orbital Cannon can get 40% off Facility Upgrades and Modifications.
